text: Va ʙar zanon [-i joisavu pirazan va] az kor aftodae, ki [digar majlu] umedi zanosui nadorand, gunohe nest, ki pusis [-i saru surat]-i xesro kanor guzorand, [ʙa sarti on ki orois va] zinatero oskor nakunand va agar iffat ʙivarzand [va xudro ʙipusonand] ʙarojason ʙehtar ast. Va Alloh taolo sunavoi donost
